text.section: Before a prospective buyer buys a majority controlling interest in a licensee, the Commission shall review the personal and financial background of the prospective buyer.

section.section: The Commission shall adopt regulations to carry out this section.

The regulations shall:
require a personal and financial background check of the prospective buyer;
specify a period of time to review the required personal and financial information before a purchase or transfer of racing days is made; and
require that notice and an invitation to comment be given to the Legislative Policy Committee at least 15 days before final approval of a purchase or transfer of racing days resulting from a purchase.
